testcase.name: Add to Basket-Items

failure.message: Use assertEquals(expected, actual, delta) to compare floating-point numbers

testcase.failure:
Given Open the browser......................................................passed When Enter the URL "http://practice.automationtesting.in/"..................passed And Click on Shop Menu......................................................passed And Now click on Home menu button...........................................passed And Test whether the Home page has Three Arrivals only......................passed Then The Home page must contains only three Arrivals........................passed When Now click the image in the Arrivals....................................passed Then Test whether it is navigating to next page where the user can add that book into his basket..passed And Image should be clickable and shoul navigate to next page where user can add that book to his basket.passed When Click on the Add To Basket button which adds that book to your basket..passed Then User can view that Book in the Menu item with price....................failed When Now click on Item link which navigates to proceed to check out page....skipped Then User can click on the Item link in menu item after adding the book in to the basket which leads to the check out page.skipped
